import React from "react"; import { useMediaQuery } from "react-responsive"; import DonationCard from "./components/donationcard"; import LightDarkButton from "./components/lightdarkbutton"; import Navbar from "./components/navbar"; import ProfilePage from "./components/profile"; import SearchBar from "./components/searchbar"; function HomeCardDetail(props) { let darkmode = localStorage.getItem("darkmode"); if(darkmode === "true"){ {document.querySelector("body").style.backgroundColor = "#1E1F22"} } else { {document.querySelector("body").style.backgroundColor = "#F7F7F7"} } return( <>

{props.title}

{props.products === "true" ?
: null}
{useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-width: 900px)'}) ? : null} ) } export default HomeCardDetail;
